_header: There is none grass that groweth in ground
Subjects: tongue, destructive power of; carols, of moral counsel
_description: A song of the ‘wikked tunge’ — five quatrains and burden: ‘Kep thi tunge thi tunge thi tunge / Thi wykyd tunge werkit me w[o]’
